alert.note: Alert for Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 11:11PM CDT until May 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEDINA...SOUTHEASTERN UVALDE...NORTHEASTERN ZAVALA AND NORTHWESTERN FRIO COUNTIES... At 1111 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Frio Town, or 14 miles northeast of Batesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Frio Town. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
